alert.note: Alert for Buena Vista (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 24 at 10:17PM CDT until June 24 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Buena Vista County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1016 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Alta, or near Storm Lake, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. A rotating wall cloud was also reported near Alta. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Storm Lake around 1020 PM CDT. Truesdale around 1025 PM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
